title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') in the table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') in the table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: The table filter should accept the value new Date('3/2/2005') without throwing an error message.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the table with a filter option.
2. Enter the value new Date('3/2/2005') in the filter input and press Enter or click the filter button.
3. Observe if an error message is thrown.
